website_summaries.verdict: Worth checking out if you want a sleek, professional looking tote with room for a laptop and more; but issues with the strap should be noted if you prefer to carry a bag on your shoulder.
pros: The perfect tote to carry to the office, thanks to the padded laptop pocket that fits devices up to 15.6 inches
Rich brown color compliments most business attire
cons: The shoulder strap isn't very durable and has been known to break, but fortunately the bag has a separate handle

customer_reviews.title: Good overall handbag
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bag yesterday.The bag was very fashionable, it has a large space to accommodate many different items, including a laptop. With a earthly tone exterior color, it’s very easy to match with clothing, and the handle and straps are very well assembled for constant use. The material used to make the bag is very durable, I believe it can stand a lot of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: external & internal have more space to let me carry more item
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice this vendor provide video that show how is front external & internal look like. I like this laptop bag for few reason, first, it has front two zipper separated space to put my cell phone or small things for me to easy to find. Second things is internal has two separated layer for me to put my 15" laptop & my ipad. Easy to organize my things. Last things is internal has big enough for me to put stuff that I don't need to bring other bag.
customer_reviews.author: KTM

customer_reviews.title: a good-looking laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop bag for my wife and she likes it very much. She used to use a backpack before I gave her this bag. This bag is good-looking and is good for business use. The quality is good. We will see if it reliable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: eiffingeri

customer_reviews.title: I really do love it and enjoy bring this bag every time when ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the bag yesterday, first thing when I opened the box it came with bag cover in case if you are not use it and away from the dust. second, It has so much space after I put my laptop in and I can still put one A4 size document folder in. the front of the bag I can put my wireless mouse and the charger. Third, If you think it is too heavy to carry it. It comes with a strap for you therefore you can put is cross on your shoulder. I really do love it and enjoy bring this bag every time when I go meeting. You should get one too!!
customer_reviews.author: Neta

customer_reviews.title: functional and great looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice!!! It looks expensive and I have received so many compliments on it. There are two things I love about it. One, it holds my 15-inch laptop. Two, it opens easily and can be left open (to reach in quickly and not have to bother opening and closing and opening and closing). I'd recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: adrastea72

customer_reviews.title: Goog quality and wonderful size for daily usage.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived nice and well. The quality of bag is much better than I expected. I already has a laptop bag, which can put nothing extra besides the laptop. I was looking a nice and women’s style laptop bag for replacement for long time and finally saw this one. I like the brown leather color, it makes it so elegant. This time I can put all things that I need inside one single bag not just one laptop, and I don’t need to carry 2 or 3 bags together anymore.
customer_reviews.author: RY Tsui

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful hand bag for my friend's needs.
customer_reviews.text: This bag comes with a neat design, stronger body and multiple pockets for all the small things. After putting a 15.6" laptop into the bag, it still has room for work notes and personal items. Not to mention it comes with a strap to help the carry. Cannot wait to surprise my friend.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and professional bag! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and professional laptop bag! It's bigger than what I expected. My 15" laptop fits in perfectly and easily. Lots of storage space for my other accessories. It doesn't look cheap at all. Actually It feels and looks like real leather. I also love the details of this bag. I'm pleased with my purchase. Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: girlsjustwannahavefun

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Strap Broke Second Time Used
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag so much but unfortunately the second time I left the house with it, the metal clip for the shoulder strap broke from one of the brackets. I think the bag is well made but would appreciate having another strap so I don’t have to carry it by the two small handles.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Forkum

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Professional, and Lite!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop bag works! Everything fits in, including my current 15.6" heavier computer. There is plenty of room for other equipment next to the computer. The outside pockets are roomy and this works to organize smaller things like transit card, keys, phone, wallet. This makes it easy to get to these items without having to open the bag. The material quality is good. This laptop bag looks like it's leather but it isn't. The material is soft and so much lighter than leather. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jashryn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a laptop bag and was disappointed at the quality. I don't feel like the actual product looks quite like the photos displayed. The faux leather is very plastic like and cheap looking. Was further surprised to realize this product doesn't offer free shipping on returns (admittedly that was a miss on my part).
customer_reviews.author: TD EDH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Barely fits the laptop that according to the specs “will fit”. If the laptop is in there, very few work papers will fit with them. Enough room for one small folder and a notebook. The straps “pop loose” and occasionally the bag will fall, thankfully there is decent cushion and the laptop hasn’t been damaged yet. Only reason I’m keeping it is I needed it for a work trip. Now it’ll sit in a the closet and won’t be used. Currently on the hunt for a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maya B

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an affordable tote for over a month and this one fit most of my requirements. very nice material, several zippered compartments and stylish. i'm hoping the inside liner does not tear as it seems a little on the flimsy side and I am not sure how to best utilize the Velcro flap that sort of holds the center divider piece but then makes things a bit awkward to get to at the bottom unless I release the Velcro. It is large enough to carry what I need to carry, day to day, so overall I am pleased with my purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: thyme

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for work and/or school
customer_reviews.text: The bag is bigger than I thought and has ample space for more than just a laptop. I can put in all my stuff needed for work/school, such as my 12" macbook, a wallet, a cosmetic bag, and a very thick book, and there is still room for more! A big plus is the laptop padding. It provides very good protection to the laptop inside because even the bottom is padded! Love it! I also like the color and the texture of the bag a lot, although it's made of faux leather. The only thing I can complain about this bag is the inner lining. It's so plastic. I hope it will be sturdy and last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Daily use - doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: April 2019 update: I've been using this bag for about 8-9 months and the strap broke around month 6 and now the hand straps are "stressed". I carry a lightweight laptop, charger, and two notebooks. I don't know why it broke, it should be able to withstand everyday use. Absolutely beautiful! This bag is perfect and professional. It is such good quality. I got one from the Amazon warehouse, no original packaging but the item itself is perfect. Also saved me ten bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Leon

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN STRAP!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop bag mainly because of the strap - makes it easier for me to carry. I've only had this about six weeks and the connector that holds the strap broke! I read a couple of reviews where this happened, but thought out of all sold, it wasn't that bad. Now I'm left with a bag where I can't use the strap. It's useless. Beautiful bag, but hardware is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Castello

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit my 15in laptop
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the bag today. Looks really nice, super attractive, however my 15 in laptop cannot fit in it. It was smaller than the dimensions stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sandra's View "Ok "
customer_reviews.text: The laptop bag arrived in a timely manner, which is nice. It is large with a lot of pockets, which I love. I chose the coffee color and the bag looks just like the picture. The bag looks, very professional. I am returning it, in person it just super plain and blah, and looks kind of cheap. I will be ordering something else, but overall a decent enough bag. BUYER BEWARE, there is a 9.69 fee to return this bag, so NO FREE RETURNS:(
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Not a carry all.
customer_reviews.text: The reason i gave it 4 stars is because my laptop fits but there is NO extra room. You can get the cord in there with it but thats it. Its fine for me but if you need to carry more stuff you will need another bag. The material is very nice. Doesnt look cheap or like plastic. Inside is pretty sturdy looking. Doubt the lining will rip easily. Im happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: It feels really cheap. The lining crackles like cellophane. The zippers have a metallic smell that sticks to your fingers until you wash your hands. It looks ok. But I could have spent that money at Ross and gotten a higher quality bag. Not inexpensive enough to account for the cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Slade

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Samsung tablet, phone, wallet, cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: I grab this purse to carry my tablet in one compartment, credit cards in wallet in another section, and cosmetics in a bag in a 3rd section. My phone goes in a front outside zippered section for easy access. The zipper in the back holds my house/car keys. There is room left over if I want to take a notebook. I don't use the long strap, just hold the handles over my shoulder. The coffee color "leather" dresses up my casual clothing. Handles are fine. I love this upgrade over my old purse that wasn't made for carrying tech stuff. Purchased Oct. 2019
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: So HAPPY with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my new laptop bag. I was looking for an elegant shoulder bag for my laptop to replace my beat up generic cloth black one. A major concern was will my 15.6" display Dell laptop fit comfortably in the bag. It did! It can fit my laptop, the charger cable, some pens and pencils and a couple of thin notebooks. The zippers zip smoothly...they don't stick. It's just an all around beautiful bag. I'm happy with the coffee color too!
customer_reviews.author: jaylrob

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The laptop bag has worked perfectly for me so far. I haven't had a chance to use it much yet but it arrived on time with no marks or scratches. It is a little softer material than I'd like for the style but it still looks like leather and has a shine to it. It's a very nice bag, fits my teaching materials, laptop, iPad, and some other smaller items. I wanted a nicer bag to take with me when I teach and this is definitely what I was looking for. I would recommend this for anyone who needs some a little more professional looking and wants to keep organized!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Totally about preference!
customer_reviews.text: This is based solely on my personal preferences. This bag is sturdy but I found it to be cumbersome. Fit both my MacBook and Surface laptops simultaneously without any issues. The bag is a bit heavy for its size. Again this is my opinion, some may find it to be amazing. I found it to just be meh.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke with minimal use, luckily I was able ...
customer_reviews.text: Edit 2 9-6-18: The strap broke again today, in the same place as the old one. Poorly made bag. Edit: I was contacted by the manufacturer, who explained there was an issue with the older straps and they had a new version available. They sent me the new straps for free. So far they seem sturdier. Original review: Strap broke with minimal use, luckily I was able to catch it before my expensive laptop hit the concrete. Clasps are plastic and worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: This purse is absolutely beautiful. It's soft, and fits my laptop, and the packaging was impeccable. I have to return though because it's just too small. I could fit my laptop and charger, and maybe my wallet and make up bag, then that's it. Too bad, other than that, no complains.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Quality, Comfort and Perfect storage areas. I appreciate the thank you note that came with the bag. The material is soft but durable. It has just the right amount of storage spaces for my 15.7" laptop, 2" binder, pocket folder, plugs, cords, , mouse, small memo pad and memory sticks. The padding for the laptop is works well without being too thick. Comfortable handles and shoulder strap. It is very comfortable to carry with shoulder strap. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Colette D. Obray

customer_reviews.title: Decent leather bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice leather bag for laptop - very attractive, and has several small zipper pockets. However, the outside pockets are tight and do not hold much, and the zipper tabs broke off easily. My laptop fits well in the bag, but the bag is not very deep (front to back) so I cannot take very many extra papers or materials in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this tote to have a more fashionable tote when I am with my clients and large enough to carry a few items from my purse so I don't have to carry both. The product looks beautiful and carries well. Large enough but not to bulky. I am extremely impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for work and traveling. I looks exactly like the photo. Most importantly, it has plenty of space for my folders, laptop, tablets and my other devices. (with room to spare)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love. This. Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical I'll be honest. The price just seemed too good to be true. But this bag really is amazing. I can fit my 14.5 in(w) X 10in (h) laptop in it perfectly. I love the velcro strap that holds my laptop in place. I also love that there is padding for my laptop as well. There is an additional padded slot that i can fit my ipad in as well! This bag enables me to not have to use any other bags when going to and from work. It's functional and sleek!
customer_reviews.author: James Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Product may be lightweight, but the zipped up bag becomes unzipped at the slightest tug and the materials on the handles are already starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, size and functionality. I did not use it daily, have only used it perhaps 6 times specifically for customer meetings, and the zipper broke. I did not overload it, never had any issues zipping it, nothing very heavy was carried, it simply wasn't durable. It's a shame, the bag looks brand new. I'm past the return window so cannot exchange. I will not rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to return this because I would actually be embarrassed to carry it. I let time slip by and the return window closed. Was not impressed AT ALL with this product
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this bag. Its cute & sturdy so far. I had a great expensive bag that lasted two decades but finally one of the straps broke and I needed an inexpensive replacement. So this bag is perfect for me. I just hope it doesn't start peeling eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Niang

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke about 6 months after I purchased it. I'm looking for a new bag now. Other than that, the bag was great. I loved the size and weight. Too bad I can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a different Edoday laptop bag for myself that I love. My sister needed a bag for her new computer and loved mine as well. Since she typically carries more stuff then I do, I purchased this product for her birthday. She has enjoyed it so much that she featured it in her blog as a must have for working moms.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for price, a weird drawback
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, been using it a week. I wish the laptop/device pocket was on the backside and not the front side. Its a really weird placement
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant look
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the bag- simple and elegant. Besides, can for everyday use since I can put my MacBook and iPad inside and still have a lot of pockets to store other stuff. The shoulder strap seems to be thinner but sturdy so far. Recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Look more professional!
customer_reviews.text: I've searched a laptop bag for a while. My friends gave me one backpack, although it's very useful, I don't wanna a "man-bag". I'm looking for an elegant, stylish bag, and also can fit my laptop. When I saw this, immediately purchase it. I really like the bright color and graceful design. So many compartments for both sides can allow me to carry out not only a lot of accessories and laptop, but also easily grab my pens, key, cosmetics, and recycled bags -- all the pockets I've filled! Also, my laptop also fits and protected. My roommates said I look more professional!
customer_reviews.author: MeMe Yu.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: beautiful color, fits laptop, mouse, accessories, and still room for purse items. fits comfortably on shoulder and looks stylish
customer_reviews.author: Y555

customer_reviews.title: Durable - Versatile laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as depicted in the photo. It's spacious and easily accommodates a large laptop, charger, mouse and a slim notebook. The inner lining feels well sewn and the zippers are of good quality. I use it nearly every day and it still looks new!! Could use a detachable shoulder strap pad.
customer_reviews.author: Angela - Villa

customer_reviews.title: Originally a 5 star review, NOW a 2 because the strap broke!
customer_reviews.text: Not the largest bag, but it's great quality and super cute. It definitely stops me from accumulating too many things during my work travels! EDIT- the strap broke as I was walking through the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag a lot but the clip on the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D. Runge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag lots of room!!
customer_reviews.text: As a handbag, I like to carry a lot of things, holds my Amazon Fire HD8 tablet beautifully !!!!! Luv it =)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Bag
customer_reviews.text: The laptop bag is beautiful, looks better in person. Seems durable so far and I have not had any issues with zippers. My only complaint about the bag is it does not expand very much. My prior bag expanded enough for me to put a small purse with my electronics, which made traveling so much easier. I have a older laptop which fills the bag to capacity so not ideal for traveling anymore. If you have a slender laptop and do not need to much room this bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It looks very professional. I have had it for about a month now & it holding up well. It not that spacious, but it can hold a laptop & other items.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyita

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after less than a month. *****update! ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke after less than a month. *****update! Company sent me a new strap after reaching out to right the situation! A+ Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading color
customer_reviews.text: The color of the bag is NOTHING like the actual color. Very disappointed. I was looking at 3 different bags, and this one kept sticking out to me because of the beautiful color in the pictures. It is very dull and more of a maroon than coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Seemed okay but SMELLED
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like crazy. Loved the color but was smaller than expected. Wanted it to hold my laptop as well as some other carry on items for a flight, but this was not the ticket. I'm not talking about a blanket or anything huge, just basic snacks and a book. Not sure how this would work for a briefcase.... It was pretty, but not as functional as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag but as soon as I put my laptop in it, the strap broke. It was the class that held the strap on. Painted to look like metal but it’s plastic that snapped right in half
customer_reviews.author: Susie Della Rocca

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag and loved it from the get go. I’m a teacher without my own classroom, so I tote this bag around with a lot in it. The carrying strap broke (I bought the old version) and they immediately sent me the new strap made with the more durable metal and an extra spare strap just in case. I was very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Messenger bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought the two short handles were adjustable. They were not. Did not care for the color. Was very disappointed that I had to pay the $8 shipping fee to return. :/
customer_reviews.author: susan b eggering

customer_reviews.title: this bag just fit my 14" laptop with protection cushion ...
customer_reviews.text: this bag just fit my 14" laptop with protection cushion. I see other users with strap problem, so far it still work for me. the leather and zipper quality is above average, I think it worth a $40 laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hank H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality made.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my computer satchel it has several pockets on the outside which hold some of my phone chargers and cords it’s comfortably on my shoulder ...love, love its beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tote bag is REALLY GOOD! Price was good and the quality is great! It fit my 14 inch laptop very well and I still have space to put other things. I use the shoulder strap and it is very durable. I got a lot of compliment about my new bag, and I highly recommend this tote bag!
customer_reviews.author: jojoloveangel

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This tote works great for everyday use with my 15.6" laptop. if traveling i would prefer a larger one to accommodate extra items in order to eliminate multiple totes/bags.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Argue

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great. Strap broke.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, strap broke pretty early on without excessive use or wait. I would not buy it again or recommend. I think a better quality & value is available.
customer_reviews.author: compuweb

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag
customer_reviews.text: a very strong bag, its a beautiful rich brown leather with enough room inside to hold additional office files or other documents .
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bag was wrapped nicely when it arrived. The color is beautiful. The bag is well made and fits all my stuff!. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, minor storage issue.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality laptop tote. I specifically chose this to carry multiple devices. My laptop fits in the main sleeve just fine. I would have given this 5 stars, but the secondary pouch does not fit my iPad while it is in its (slim) case so I can’t store it in there. Otherwise, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a high quality, durable bag. It's attractive and big enough to double as a purse. I was carrying a bulky laptop case and a purse. Now I can carry one bag without juggling the two. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Brissette

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag while I was in the US. Within 2 weeks the zipper broke but I had alrrady left the US. There is no way to contact the seller. I contacted Amazon and found that the seller only communicates with them and not customers. I am so disappointed because I do like the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Quantity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an employee and was surprised at the fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo Biily

customer_reviews.title: Business
customer_reviews.text: Fits one laptop only. Barely room for notepads, pens, etc. Looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rawal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag, but weak strap.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, but after only about two months of carrying my 15” HP laptop in it with a thin notebook, the metal clip holding the long strap in place broke. Luckily it didn’t damage my laptop. It’s still a very nice bag without the strap and I still use it, just with the shorter straps. I’d recommend either getting a stronger strap if you purchase this, or just carrying it by the small straps on your arm.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Career Tote Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my career needs. Clean well made spacious bag. Just wipe down with a lamp cloth for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: History_Teacher

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the price. Although the bag looks nice, the zipper does not work well. It does not matter if there are many items or a few items, the zipper does not zip appropriately. If it were not for the zipper issues, I would love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: MsG0608

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Sleek and clean. I needed something for my work laptop and my personal items because I was sick of carrying two bags. A huge plus is that I’m tall and the strap adjusts to a long enough length for me to wear it as a crossbody bag. I might even buy a brighter color for spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown and described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown and described! I've been searching high and low for a bag like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Q.

customer_reviews.title: Bag is great, but should strap broke almost right away
customer_reviews.text: Edit: they sent me a secondary strap, and it lasted quite a while longer and seemed much sturdier. My second strap just broke today on 8/8/19– anyone know if I can order a new one or if they can send me another replacement? Love my bag and get compliments on it all the time. The bag itself is great, but I bought it on January 2nd, and the shoulder strap broke today. So disappointed. Will be contacting seller to see if the strap can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good size but clip broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for day to day use. Not too bulky. I was really happy with it until today, after not quite 3 months of use, the plastic that looks like metal clip for the strap just broke while walking to my car. Thankfully I was able to grab the bag before my laptop fell out.
customer_reviews.author: beth5478

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting out of the box, one handle was disjointed. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag !! Made very well, I will be using this everyday as a laptop bag and will use this as an additional bag for traveling on airplanes. Its perfect !!! Love the packaging too, I'm impressed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap not durable
customer_reviews.text: One of the clips in the shoulder strap broke after a month. Update - Seller contacted me to send a replacement strap. Look forward to using it and hope it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Quality, size and professional look - an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material appears to be strong and the size is excellent. The bag looks professional and the colour goes well with any wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: susan portell-griffith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really resemble picture
customer_reviews.text: While it arrived quickly and has nothing wrong with it, exactly, it looks like cheap vinyl. The picture makes it look far more like leather, but I should have known better, given the price: my fault entirely. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this bag! The color is gorgeous, the quality is amazing, especially for this price. The computer section is nicely padded and very secure and there are so many compartments for storage. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mali M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my laptop and other work items. Not overly big or bulky, but it does the job! Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JaxxWay

customer_reviews.title: The color doesn’t look like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The color in the picture isn’t quite what I received. I’m going to keep this bag anyways to see if I like the messenger style. If so then I’ll opt for a real leather bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Prier

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality, sturdy, great product. I fit my laptop, folders, notebook, charger, earphones, and wireless mouse in it easily. Best purchase yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's professional looking without being super expensive! Fits my 15 inch macbook pro perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh S

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to put in and take out
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my wife and she really likes the color and the design. Her MacBook Air fits in perfectly. It is very easy to put in and take out. There are zipped pockets inside and outside which provide more space for other stuff. I will recommend this bag to all business ladies who need carry the laptop for work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and how light but dont let that fool you. You can still cram it full of all the stuff you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ccostello

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag that was packaged so carefully. It was love at first sight. I have only been using the bag for 2 weeks now but have no complaints at all. I will probably be ordering the other 2 colors. I would recommend to anyone that lugs work back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: S Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter and she loved it. Perfect for her laptop
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter and she loved it. Perfect for her laptop. The company even sent me an email and said that if we ever need any replacement parts they would ship them. I'm pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Miles

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: It holds my laptop and Ipad with other ir=tems so i dont need to carry to bags
customer_reviews.author: Lindoc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this laptop bag! It looks great in person and is the perfect size to not weigh you down with junk!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It crinkles like plastic when you touch it. Cheap, but cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: It crinkles like plastic when you touch it. Cheap, but cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: ... a Realtor and needed a laptop bag/briefcase that looked nice and professional without costing a fortune
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Realtor and needed a laptop bag/briefcase that looked nice and professional without costing a fortune. I've been using this one for about six months now and I still love it. A lot of people ask me where I got it. So far it's holding up great, though to be honest I don't use it every day since I sometime just bring my small purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very nice, but the clasp hooking the shoulder strap to the bag broke.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Alwine

customer_reviews.title: Handy in use
customer_reviews.text: The bag is too good and it is handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Bharti

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great quality! Bag is soft and solid, has several small zipped pockets. It's big enough to put a 15.6" laptop, iPad and all accessories needed. Laptop compartment is padded and has a Velcro strap for protection. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: 10 outta 10 Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bag was nicely packaged and looks no different from the picture. I got it as a gift for a friend and she absolutely loved it. The quality is nice as well, I’d definitely recommend this laptop tote.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna McCornell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tote. My laptop fits perfectly, with room for writing tablets as well. Better than having a briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bag and was a great purchase. Lots of compartments and very roomy!!! Fits my laptop, charger, mouse, notebooks, etc. Looks great with all my outfits that I ware to the office! Do yourself a favor and buy this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fits Both of my laptops perfectly which is exactly what I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Chisolm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking -- and just the right size -- bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking -- and just the right size -- bag for my very thin 15" diagonal computer, charger, and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strap
customer_reviews.text: The bag overall is very good quality. I used it for a couple of months and then the strap broke. I read on these reviews that the seller would replace the strap because it is a known defect. So I contacted the seller on 1/16/19 asking for a replacement and they asked that I wait a few days for my new one. Today is 2/4/19 and still no strap...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the look of the fake leather but the bag fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Reuter

product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

 * Date First Available :August 14, 2017

 * ASIN :B074SJ95RV

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank:  *  #1031 inLaptop Messenger & Shoulder Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars461 ratings
feature_bullets: LAPTOP BAG FOR WOMEN--Classic design laptop bag for women up to 15.6 inch,Now we have improved the shoulder straps to be stronger and more durable,If you get the old straps OR have any problem,please contact us-we will resend you new one for replace
INDEPENDENT LAPTOP PROTECTIVE LAYER--One main protective layer about 0.6cm thick with top elastic clasp

LAPTOP BAG FOR WOMEN ADVANTAGE--1.Double strong handles with metal fix components,2.the bag front side with two zipper pockets,separated spaces make things easy to find.3.main center independent padded laptop layer,medium size for iPad,power bank and so on
MATERIAL AND DESIGN--Big size and capacity,soft external material and durable lining,perfect for casual work business/all-purpose use
